definition: Dual Income, No Kids (DINK) (loanword)
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
surname Ding
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
variant of 剋|克[ke4]
to scold/to beat

sentences.english: Wenger added: 'I rate Guus Hiddink highly.
sentences.chinese: 温格又说，“我对古斯希丁克评价很高。

sentences.english: If they firmly believe one-child policy, there will be more and more the dink.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们坚信独生子女政策，将会有越来越多的丁克。

sentences.english: Hiddink's plans should be clarified shortly.
sentences.chinese: 希丁克的计划应该被简短的阐明。

sentences.english: Also in making fun of butyl man?
DINK means double incomes no kids.
sentences.chinese: 丁克家庭指双收入无子女家庭。

sentences.english: There are more and more DINK families in big cities.
sentences.chinese: 大城市里“丁克”家庭越来越多。

sentences.english: Most DINK families have higher income.
sentences.chinese: 大多数丁克家庭的收入增加了。

sentences.english: DINK family means a "Double Income No Kids" family.
sentences.chinese: 丁克家庭就是指双收入没有孩子的家庭。

sentences.english: DINK families refer to families that have dual income and no kids.
sentences.chinese: 丁克家庭是指有双份工资然则没有孩子的家庭。

sentences.english: Ancelotti said yesterday that he would be happy to work with Hiddink.
sentences.chinese: 安切洛蒂昨天说，他很高兴跟希丁克一起工作。

sentences.english: There are more and more DINKS in China now.
sentences.chinese: 中国的丁克族也越来越多。

sentences.english: Hiddink's reputation now needs remedial work although he will not lack for offers of employment.
sentences.chinese: 尽管饭碗不愁，但希丁克可得好好挽回自己的名声了。

sentences.english: Many people choose a DINK family now.
sentences.chinese: 现在许多家庭都选择丁克方式。

sentences.english: Russian football has taken a step backwards, " Hiddink said.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯足球已经退步了，”希丁克说。

sentences.english: Zhao Xiaorou and boy friend Wu Di are a standard originally " Ding Ke gens " .
sentences.chinese: 赵晓柔与男朋友吴迪原本是标准的“丁克一族”。

sentences.english: In recent years, many DINK families have come forth in big cities.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，在大城市出现了很多丁克家庭。
